name: MTLDrawable
desc: A displayable resource that can be rendered or written to.

items.name: var drawableID: Int
items.desc: A positive integer that identifies the drawable.

items.name: func present()
items.desc: Presents the drawable onscreen as soon as possible.

items.name: func present(afterMinimumDuration: CFTimeInterval)
items.desc: Presents the drawable onscreen as soon as possible after a previous drawable is visible for the specified duration.

items.name: func present(at: CFTimeInterval)
items.desc: Presents the drawable onscreen at a specific host time.

items.name: func addPresentedHandler(MTLDrawablePresentedHandler)
items.desc: Registers a block of code to be called immediately after the drawable is presented.

items.name: var presentedTime: CFTimeInterval
items.desc: The host time, in seconds, when the drawable was displayed onscreen.
